Token.Abstract: Provides types and methods used to handle HTTP Live Streaming (HLS) video
Creates a new in-memory HLS VirtuosoAsset.
Token.Declaration: + (nullable VirtuosoAsset *)assetWithAssetID:(nonnull NSString *)assetID description:(nonnull NSString *)description manifestUrl:(nonnull NSString *)manifestUrl protectionType:(kVDE_AssetProtectionType)protectionType includeEncryptionKeys:(Boolean)includeEncryption maximumBitrate:(long long)maximumBitrate publishDate:(nullable NSDate *)publishDate expiryDate:(nullable NSDate *)expiryDate assetDownloadLimit:(int)assetDownloadLimit enableFastPlay:(Boolean)enableFastPlay userInfo:(nullable NSDictionary *)userInfo onReadyForDownload:(nullable AssetReadyForDownloadBlock)readyBlock onParseComplete:(nullable AssetParsingCompletedBlock)completeBlock

Parameter.Name: assetID
Parameter.Abstract: A globally unique identifier for the asset. Used in all log events. IMPORTANT: This value must be globally unique across all assets within the Catalog. Dupicate AssetID's are not allowed.

Parameter.Name: description
Parameter.Abstract: A description of the asset. Virtuoso only uses this in log output.

Parameter.Name: manifestUrl
Parameter.Abstract: Where the manifest lives on the Internet.

Parameter.Name: protectionType
Parameter.Abstract: You should pass the default value of kVDE_AssetProtectionTypePassthrough unless instructed differently by Penthera support.

Parameter.Name: includeEncryption
Parameter.Abstract: If YES, then this method will download any encryption keys in manifest. Normally, you would pass YES, but this allows for custom behaviors.

Parameter.Name: maximumBitrate
Parameter.Abstract: For manifests containing multiple profiles, Virtuoso will select the highest bitrate profile whose bitrate doesn't exceed this value. A value of 1 means "use the lowest bitrate." If there's no profile of lower bitrate than maximumBitrate, Virtuoso will select the lowest bitrate profile. A value of INT_MAX means "use the highest bitrate."

Parameter.Name: publishDate
Parameter.Abstract: Virtuoso will not provide API access to the asset until this date. Nil means "now."

Parameter.Name: expiryDate
Parameter.Abstract: Virtuoso will not provide API access to the asset after this date. Nil means no expiry.

Parameter.Name: assetDownloadLimit
Parameter.Abstract: Virtuoso applies this value instead of the backplane-defined global asset download limit A value < 0 means to use the backplane defined value. A value of 0 means unlimited. A value > 0 will be applied to download permissions checks for this asset.

Parameter.Name: enableFastPlay
Parameter.Abstract: If enabled, Virtuoso will automatically download the initial portion of the asset as soon as the asset is created. Whenever an asset is streamed, the cached beginning of the asset will be returned to the player immediatley, eliminating startup buffer time for streamed playback.

Parameter.Name: userInfo
Parameter.Abstract: A convenience field allowing you to associate arbitrary data with an asset. Virtuoso will serialize this data and store it, but not explicitly use this data. The provided userInfo must be property-list compatible. May be nil.

Parameter.Name: readyBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Called when the asset is ready to be added to the download queue

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Called when asset parsing completes. May be nil.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new (empty) VirtuosoAsset object, or nil if there was an error.

Token.Abstract: Creates a new in-memory HLS VirtuosoAsset object.
Token.Declaration: + (nullable VirtuosoAsset *)assetWithAssetID:(nonnull NSString *)assetID description:(nonnull NSString *)description manifestUrl:(nonnull NSString *)manifestUrl protectionType:(kVDE_AssetProtectionType)protectionType includeEncryptionKeys:(Boolean)includeEncryption maximumBitrate:(long long)maximumBitrate publishDate:(nullable NSDate *)publishDate expiryDate:(nullable NSDate *)expiryDate expiryAfterDownload:(NSTimeInterval)expiryAfterDownload expiryAfterPlay:(NSTimeInterval)expiryAfterPlay assetDownloadLimit:(int)assetDownloadLimit enableFastPlay:(Boolean)enableFastPlay userInfo:(nullable NSDictionary *)userInfo onReadyForDownload:(nullable AssetReadyForDownloadBlock)readyBlock onParseComplete:(nullable AssetParsingCompletedBlock)completeBlock

Parameter.Name: assetID
Parameter.Abstract: A globally unique identifier for the asset. Used in all log events. IMPORTANT: This value must be globally unique across all assets within the Catalog. Dupicate AssetID's are not allowed.

Parameter.Name: description
Parameter.Abstract: A description of the asset. Virtuoso only uses this in log output.

Parameter.Name: manifestUrl
Parameter.Abstract: Where the manifest lives on the Internet.

Parameter.Name: protectionType
Parameter.Abstract: You should pass the default value of kVDE_AssetProtectionTypePassthrough unless instructed differently by Penthera support.

Parameter.Name: includeEncryption
Parameter.Abstract: If YES, then this method will download any encryption keys in manifest. Normally, you would pass YES, but this allows for custom behaviors.

Parameter.Name: maximumBitrate
Parameter.Abstract: For manifests containing multiple profiles, Virtuoso will select the highest bitrate profile whose bitrate doesn't exceed this value. A value of 1 means "use the lowest bitrate." If there's no profile of lower bitrate than maximumBitrate, Virtuoso will select the lowest bitrate profile. A value of INT_MAX means "use the highest bitrate."

Parameter.Name: publishDate
Parameter.Abstract: Virtuoso will not provide API access to the asset until this date. Nil means "now."

Parameter.Name: expiryDate
Parameter.Abstract: Virtuoso will not provide API access to the asset after this date. Nil means no expiry.

Parameter.Name: expiryAfterDownload
Parameter.Abstract: Amount of time after Virtuoso completes download of the asset that Virtuoso will delete the asset. In seconds. <=0 means no expiry.

Parameter.Name: expiryAfterPlay
Parameter.Abstract: Amount of time after the asset is first played that Virtuoso will delete the asset. In seconds. <=0 means no expiry.

Parameter.Name: assetDownloadLimit
Parameter.Abstract: Virtuoso applies this value instead of the backplane-defined global asset download limit A value < 0 means to use the backplane defined value. A value of 0 means unlimited. A value > 0 will be applied to download permissions checks for this asset.

Parameter.Name: enableFastPlay
Parameter.Abstract: If enabled, Virtuoso will automatically download the initial portion of the asset as soon as the asset is created. Whenever an asset is streamed, the cached beginning of the asset will be returned to the player immediatley, eliminating startup buffer time for streamed playback.

Parameter.Name: userInfo
Parameter.Abstract: A convenience field allowing you to associate arbitrary data with an asset. Virtuoso will serialize this data and store it, but not explicitly use this data. The provided userInfo must be property-list compatible. May be nil.

Parameter.Name: readyBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Called when the asset is ready to be added to the download queue

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Called when asset parsing completes. May be nil.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new (empty) VirtuosoAsset object, or nil if there was an error.

Token.Abstract: Creates a new in-memory HLS VirtuosoAsset object.
Token.Declaration: + (nullable VirtuosoAsset *)assetWithAssetID:(nonnull NSString *)assetID description:(nonnull NSString *)description manifestUrl:(nonnull NSString *)manifestUrl protectionType:(kVDE_AssetProtectionType)protectionType includeEncryptionKeys:(Boolean)includeEncryption maximumBitrate:(long long)maximumBitrate publishDate:(nullable NSDate *)publishDate expiryDate:(nullable NSDate *)expiryDate expiryAfterDownload:(NSTimeInterval)expiryAfterDownload expiryAfterPlay:(NSTimeInterval)expiryAfterPlay assetDownloadLimit:(int)assetDownloadLimit enableFastPlay:(Boolean)enableFastPlay ancillaries:(nullable NSArray *)ancillaries adsProvider:(nullable VirtuosoAdsProvider *)adsProvider userInfo:(nullable NSDictionary *)userInfo onReadyForDownload:(nullable AssetReadyForDownloadBlock)readyBlock onParseComplete:(nullable AssetParsingCompletedBlock)completeBlock

Parameter.Name: assetID
Parameter.Abstract: A globally unique identifier for the asset. Used in all log events. IMPORTANT: This value must be globally unique across all assets within the Catalog. Dupicate AssetID's are not allowed.

Parameter.Name: description
Parameter.Abstract: A description of the asset. Virtuoso only uses this in log output.

Parameter.Name: manifestUrl
Parameter.Abstract: Where the manifest lives on the Internet.

Parameter.Name: protectionType
Parameter.Abstract: You should pass the default value of kVDE_AssetProtectionTypePassthrough unless instructed differently by Penthera support.

Parameter.Name: includeEncryption
Parameter.Abstract: If YES, then this method will download any encryption keys in manifest. Normally, you would pass YES, but this allows for custom behaviors.

Parameter.Name: maximumBitrate
Parameter.Abstract: For manifests containing multiple profiles, Virtuoso will select the highest bitrate profile whose bitrate doesn't exceed this value. A value of 1 means "use the lowest bitrate." If there's no profile of lower bitrate than maximumBitrate, Virtuoso will select the lowest bitrate profile. A value of INT_MAX means "use the highest bitrate."

Parameter.Name: publishDate
Parameter.Abstract: Virtuoso will not provide API access to the asset until this date. Nil means "now."

Parameter.Name: expiryDate
Parameter.Abstract: Virtuoso will not provide API access to the asset after this date. Nil means no expiry.

Parameter.Name: expiryAfterDownload
Parameter.Abstract: Amount of time after Virtuoso completes download of the asset that Virtuoso will delete the asset. In seconds. <=0 means no expiry.

Parameter.Name: expiryAfterPlay
Parameter.Abstract: Amount of time after the asset is first played that Virtuoso will delete the asset. In seconds. <=0 means no expiry.

Parameter.Name: assetDownloadLimit
Parameter.Abstract: Virtuoso applies this value instead of the backplane-defined global asset download limit A value < 0 means to use the backplane defined value. A value of 0 means unlimited. A value > 0 will be applied to download permissions checks for this asset.

Parameter.Name: enableFastPlay
Parameter.Abstract: If enabled, Virtuoso will automatically download the initial portion of the asset as soon as the asset is created. Whenever an asset is streamed, the cached beginning of the asset will be returned to the player immediatley, eliminating startup buffer time for streamed playback.

Parameter.Name: ancillaries
Parameter.Abstract: Optional array of VirtuosoAncillaryFile's

Parameter.Name: adsProvider
Parameter.Abstract: BETA Feature. Instance of AdsProvider to use with this Asset.

Parameter.Name: userInfo
Parameter.Abstract: A convenience field allowing you to associate arbitrary data with an asset. Virtuoso will serialize this data and store it, but not explicitly use this data. The provided userInfo must be property-list compatible. May be nil.

Parameter.Name: readyBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Called when the asset is ready to be added to the download queue

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Called when asset parsing completes. May be nil.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new (empty) VirtuosoAsset object, or nil if there was an error.

Token.Abstract: Adds a manifest URL to this VirtuosoAsset. Call does nothing if the VirtuosoAsset is not an HLS asset.

Parameter.Name: manifestUrl
Parameter.Abstract: Where the manifest lives on the Internet.

Parameter.Name: includeEncryption
Parameter.Abstract: If YES, then this method will download any encryption keys in manifest. Normally, you would pass YES, but this allows for custom behaviors.

Parameter.Name: maximumBitrate
Parameter.Abstract: For manifests containing multiple profiles, Virtuoso will select the highest bitrate profile whose bitrate doesn't exceed this value. A value of 1 means "use the lowest bitrate." If there's no profile of lower bitrate than maximumBitrate, Virtuoso will select the lowest bitrate profile. A value of INT_MAX means "use the highest bitrate."

Parameter.Name: completeBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Called when asset parsing completes. May be nil.

Token.Abstract: Returns the local file path for the HLS manifest of the given type and subtype

Parameter.Name: type
Parameter.Abstract: The HLS manifest type to return

Parameter.Name: subtype
Parameter.Abstract: The subtype of the manifest to return

ReturnValue.Abstract: The local file path for the HLS manifest of the given type and subtype

Token.Abstract: Starts async process to refresh Advertisements associated with this asset.
The local file path for the saved FastPlay manifest file
